memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *experimentName, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: LightField

briefdescription.para: Constructor for LightField driver; most parameters are simply passed to ADDriver::ADDriver.

detaileddescription.para:
After calling the base class constructor this method creates a thread to collect the detector data, and sets reasonable default values for the parameters defined in this class, asynNDArrayDriver and ADDriver.
portName
The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
experimentName
The name of the experiment to open initially. Set this to an empty string to open the default experiment in LightField.
maxBuffers
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
maxMemory
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
priority
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
stackSize
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquire, ADBinX, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynFloat64->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquireTime, ADGain, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynOctet->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including NDAttributesFile. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Address of the string to write.
nChars
Number of characters to write.
nActual
Number of characters actually written.

memberdef.argsstring: (asynUser *pasynUser, char *strings[], int values[], int severities[], size_t nElements, size_t *nIn)
memberdef.name: readEnum

detaileddescription.para:
This method will open (1) or close (0) the shutter if ADShutterMode==ADShutterModeEPICS. Drivers will implement setShutter if they support ADShutterModeDetector. If ADShutterMode=ADShutterModeDetector they will control the shutter directly, else they will call this method.
open
1 (open) or 0 (closed)

Prints details about the driver if details>0. It then calls the ADDriver::report() method.
fp
File pointed passed by caller where the output is written to.
details
If >0 then driver details are printed.

briefdescription.para: callback function that is called by XISL every frame at end of data transfer

memberdef.argsstring: (int param, String^ setting, asynParamType epicsType, LFSetting_t LFType)
memberdef.name: addSetting

briefdescription.para: Driver for Princeton Instruments cameras using the LightField Automation software.
